Q_DESC:
The nodes with a certain data D are deleted from the linked list. For example if the given Linked List is 5->10->15->10->25 and delete after 10 then the Linked List becomes 5->15->25.
INPUT
First line contains the number of datas- N. Second line contains N integers(the given linked list).
The node data D that has to be deleted.
OUTPUT
case 1(node X is Valid. ) :
Display the final Linked List.
case 2(node X is Invalid) :
Print Invalid node!
Display the Linked list.
